description.value:
You can alter offensive spells to be less deadly. If your next action is to Cast a Spell that deals damage and doesn't have the death or void trait, that spell gains the nonlethal trait.

Jailbreak If you use Jailbreak Spell to use this spellshape, you can choose to make the spell an illusion that deals nonlethal mental damage. If the spell requires a Fortitude or Reflex save, it becomes a Will save. If the spell requires a spell attack roll against AC, you make your spell attack roll against the target's Will DC instead. The spell gains the illusion and mental traits.
